entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
